regular.name: Rookie Angler
regular.location: Getting after reach 5% of Fishing Encyclopedia

regular.name: Skilled Angler
regular.location: Getting after reach 15% of Fishing Encyclopedia

regular.name: Fishing Master
regular.location: Getting after LvL 45 fishing SP job.

regular.name: Fishing Student
regular.location: Getting at P3 15-50 Lv Fish Craft NPC.

regular.name: Lucky Angler
regular.location: Getting at P5 30-50 Lv Fish Craft NPC & 300 Coins at Web Coin Shop.

regular.name: Premium Angler
regular.location: Getting at Web Coin Shop buying for 450 Coins.

regular.name: Fish Merchant
regular.location: You can get at Web Coin Shop for free (Tittle Section).
